cpsc3720.contactserver

Class ContactServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsc3720.contactserver.ContactServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContactService

    @RestController
@EnableAutoConfiguration
public class ContactServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContactService
    Contact Server represents the server side functionality, and keeps track of separate game instances.
    Author:
    Matthew Higgins, Ella Kokinda, Chris levesque, Keven "Beans" Hayes

      • fireTorpedo

        @RequestMapping(value="/FireTorpedo")
public AttackLogObject fireTorpedo(@RequestBody
                                         FireParams params)
        This is called by the the main game screen when fire torpedo is selected. this checks to see if there is a ship to shoot and shoots it or records a miss If a ship is destroyed it calls the methods to destroy it.
        Specified by:
        fireTorpedo in interface ContactService
        Parameters:
        params - - object which holds the necessary parameters for the function
        Returns:
